name: MPC + AA = The Unexpected Dynamic Duo
description: Contrary to common perceptions, Multi-Party Computation (MPC) and Account Abstraction can be seamlessly integrated to craft a robust and secure user experience, acting as a catalyst for widespread cryptocurrency adoption among non-web3 familiar audiences. In this presentation, we will underscore the significance of utilizing MPC for advanced key management, paired with smart contracts for effortless funds management, marking a pivotal stride towards mainstream cryptocurrency acceptance.

speakers.name: Parsa Attari
speakers.bio: I graduated from UC Berkeley and have had the priviledge to work at companies suc as Brex, Segment and Workday. I am currently the co-founder at Portal Labs, a San Francisco based wallet infrastructure provider.
